description: Get your groove on out on the slopes in this groovy tie dye printed Ski Full Cushion Over the Calf Socks. Featuring our Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability and our 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a peak-performance fit, plus body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability. And with cushion all-around the foot, it provides all-day comfort that never gives up. Far out!
name: Smartwool Ski Full Cushion Groovy Tie Dye Print Over The Calf Socks - Mens
